# UITimingCurveType.spring

**Case**

Use a custom spring animation. Specify the desired curve using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITimingCurveProvider/springTimingParameters] property.

## Declaration

```swift
case spring
```

## Constants

- **UITimingCurveType.builtin**: Use the built-in UIKit timing curves. Specify this value when you want to use one of the constants in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/AnimationCurve] type. Specify the desired curve using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITimingCurveProvider/cubicTimingParameters] property.
- **UITimingCurveType.cubic**: Use a custom cubic Bézier curve. Specify the curve information using the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITimingCurveProvider/cubicTimingParameters] property.
- **UITimingCurveType.composed**: Use a combination of timing parameters. This type of curve starts with the curve defined by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITimingCurveProvider/cubicTimingParameters] property and modifies it using the spring information in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITimingCurveProvider/springTimingParameters] property.
